body_text_paragraphs.text: * Frank and Bernice J. Greenberg Professor of Law, University of Chicago Law School, and associate professor, Department of Sociology. Thanks to Erin Miller for extensive and illuminating comments, and to participants in the symposium—in particular Yasmin Dawood—for terrific questions and conversation. The editors of theSouthern California Law Review, in particular Michelle Solarczyk and Tyler Young, did exemplary work in making this essay better. The Frank J. Cicero Foundation provided support for this work.
